channel.title: How do i make admins on 1337 ownage?
channel.description: i dnt know how it restarts my rights when i log in for some reson =([br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2007, 02:45:17 AM[/size][hr]help!!!!

item.title: How do i make admins on 1337 ownage?
item.dc:creator: @lethal_god lethal god
item.description:
@lethal_god wrote:

make sure you save your file when you adjust the playerrights.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make admins on 1337 ownage?
item.dc:creator: @kkjdisgod kkjdisgod
item.description:
@kkjdisgod wrote:

go into client.java
ctrl+f type in playerrights =
keep searching until u find this: i
f(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Ryan”))
playerRights = 2;
then just take out the name (in this case its Mod Ryan) and put your own.

hope i helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make admins on 1337 ownage?

item.title: How do i make admins on 1337 ownage?
item.dc:creator: @X_SCAR_X X SCAR X
item.description:
@X_SCAR_X wrote:

Its easy go to chars on your server folder find character rights and put too either 1 (mod) or 2 (admin) or 3 (owner) ;D
